author: Okogba
title: Kane hits third hat-trick of 2017
text:
Home » Sports » Kane hits third hat-trick of 2017 Kane hits third hat-trick of 2017 On 10:23 pm In Sports by Okogba Comments 
H ARRY KANE was the toast of White Hart Lane yesterday as the Tottenham superstar smashed in another superb hat-trick to help crush Stoke 4-0. 
A masterclass from Kane ensured Mauricio Pochettino left the pitch with a beaming smile as he opened the scoring with a fine effort in the 14th minute. Harry Kane 
It marked his 100th career goal, but Kane was far from done as he doubled his side’s tally just after the half-hour mark. 
The 23-year-old then ensured it was a day to remember when he scored his third via a deflected free-kick, making it three hat-tricks in his last nine outings. 
Kane still had enough in the tank to nab an assist in the dying moments of the first-half, teeing up Dele Alli for a confidence-boosting finish.
